Fishing Tutorial:
The bait for fishing is of three kinds.
Usual Bait, Bait - R99, used from the 99th level, and Bait PA, which can be purchased for glasses PA.
In the Guild of Anglers sell the usual Bait and Bait - R99.
Depending on the bait, you can catch different fish. The most expensive Strong Fish bites only on Bait - R99 and Bait PA.
